PATIENT_ID: TEST_ARDS_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-16 10:00:00
Patient has developed acute respiratory distress syndrome.
ARDS diagnosed based on Berlin criteria.
Bilateral opacities noted on chest imaging.
PaO2/FiO2 ratio 142, consistent with moderate ARDS.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-16 09:30:00
CXR: Bilateral infiltrates noted.
Diffuse bilateral airspace disease with consolidation.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-16 14:00:00
Patient on mechanical ventilation with PEEP of 12 cmH2O.
P/F ratio 142 consistent with moderate ARDS.
CPAP settings adjusted.
